meaningMnemonic: I've <kanji>announce</kanji>d I'm going to <kanji>sue</kanji> you. The <vocabulary>accusation</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>charge</vocabulary> I have against you for suing you? Uh... You suck.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
